overview: The story is about a mysterious wanderer who passes through a village on his way, a young girl who is not willing to be a frog at the bottom of the well is forced to work in a bar opened by the local ruffian king, in the eyes of everyone Zimo is the ruffian king's woman, but Zimo does not think so, the wanderer Lin Feng met Zimo, Zimo fell in love with Lin Feng at first sight and had an intimate relationship
title: Ronin Mad
